meanings: (눈에 들어오다) be seen, come in sight, (나타나다) appear
(보여 주다) show (sth to sb / sb sth), display, demonstrate, let sb see, (formal) exhibit

vlive.korean: 두 명 보였다! I see two people! 듣기 View video SF9 : [LEAGUE OF SF(셒)GENDS] NOMINEE #2 – ‘인성씨의 필드트립’
아이고 - 부상당해 보였다. Oh my! - He looks injured. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 오늘부터 1일?!
그게 막 보였다 안 보였다 하더라고요. I can see it at first but then I can't. 듣기 View video Apink : 끊겼다ㅜㅜ
vlive.english: I can see it at first but then I can't.

vlive.korean: 그전에는 아예 안 보였다? 두 사람은? So, you didn't know the presence of these two in the past? 듣기 View video 개가수 프로듀서 <스트리밍> : EP_24트와이스도 챙겨보는데~ 안 볼 고냐아↗?
vlive.english: So, you didn't know the presence of these two in the past?

vlive.korean: 나 수면바지 입었는데 보였다 - 너 혹시 이 물건도 보정하는 거야? They saw my pants. - Will you use a filter for this? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 월요일밤 여친과 함께👍
vlive.english: They saw my pants. - Will you use a filter for this?

examples.korean: He motioned for us to follow him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 우리에게 따라오라는 몸짓을 해 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He motioned for us to follow him. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She gestured for them to come in. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 그들에게 들어오라고 손짓을 해 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She gestured for them to come in. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She nodded at him to begin speaking 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 그에게 말을 시작하라고 고개를 까딱해 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She nodded at him to begin speaking Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They all raised their glasses in salute. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들이 모두 경의의 표시로 잔을 들어 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They all raised their glasses in salute. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The robbery appeared to have been an inside job. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 강도 행위는 내부자의 소행으로 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The robbery appeared to have been an inside job. Add to Wordbook
